price: Или да их неће казнити док у страху стрепе? Али, Господар ваш је заиста благ и милостив.
arabic: أَوۡ يَأۡخُذَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ تَخَوُّفٖ فَإِنَّ رَبَّكُمۡ لَرَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٌ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: aw yakhudhahum ʿalā takhawwufin fa-inna rabbakum laraūfun raḥīmun
